name: Ancient Copper Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walk, 40 ft. climb, 80 ft. fly
description: The Ancient Copper Dragon has dark greenish-brown scales reminiscent of weathered copper and a gargantuan presence. It is known for its sharp intelligence and loves riddles and games. Its body is powerful with elongated claws, a formidable tail, and a wide wingspan.
memorable: This dragon frequently employs mischievous tricks and is known for its capability to breathe corrosive acid, along with abilities that slow and confuse its enemies.
goals: Ancient Copper Dragons often seek to play tricks on travelers, hoard treasures, and engage in intellectual challenges rather than outright violence, although they are fierce when provoked.
relations: Often shares connections with other metallic dragons, as well as various creatures inhabiting mountainous terrains.
environment: Typically found in rocky hills or mountains, residing in hidden labyrinthine caves.
strengths: Immunity to acid damage and possesses innate spellcasting abilities, allowing it to manipulate the battlefield with spells that incapacitate or control.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity and Wisdom scores limit its ability to maneuver stealthily and perceive subtle environments, somewhat offsetting its overall power.
attacks: Utilizes sharp bite attacks coupled with slashing claw strikes and a powerful tail. Can unleash Acid Spit and potent breath weapons dealing significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Legendary Resistance allows the dragon to succeed on saving throws it would otherwise fail, significantly enhancing its resilience.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and a high passive perception score of 27, allowing it to detect even the stealthiest of creatures.
skills: High proficiency in Deception and Perception, making it an adept manipulator and highly aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Can change shape into humanoid or beast forms, retaining its abilities and intelligence.
Has the ability 'Flow Within the Mountain' which grants advantage on Stealth checks in mountainous areas.
Legendary actions allow for additional tactical options, enhancing its unpredictability in battle.
Breath weapons can deal massive damage in a straight line or create area effects that slow enemies.
Known for its playful and cunning personality, fostering a sense of engagement in encounters.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting uses Charisma, capable of casting spells like 'Hideous Laughter' and 'Mass Suggestion' without components.
